actions.text: On agreeing to the Bright amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment to require a National Academy of Sciences study on the role of community colleges in cybersecurity education. The study would also identify best practices related to cybersecurity education between community colleges and four-year educational institutions.
purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 111-410 to require a National Academy of Sciences study on the role of community colleges in cybersecurity education. The study would also identify best practices related to cybersecurity education between community colleges and four-year educational institutions.
